articles.title: Museums in the metaverse: How Web3 technology can help historical sites - Cointelegraph
articles.description: As metaverses become new models for tourism, they may also rewrite history in the process.
articles.content:
Metaverse events at ancient and historical sites could soon shape up to be an alternate future for tourism.
